Let a,b,c be non-zero real numbers such that b²-4ac, and f(x)=ax²+bx+c. If the set S consists of all integers m such that f(m)<0, then the set S must necessarily be
option2: either the empty set or the set of all integers
option4: the set of all positive integers
correctAnswer: either the empty set or the set of all integers

questionText: Trains A and B start traveling at the same time towards each other with constant speeds from stations X and Y, respectively.
